Quote: The bad news is time flies. The good news is you're the pilot.
Author: Michael Altshuler

Quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
Author: Winston Churchill

Quote: No matter what people tell you, words and ideas can change the world.
Author: Robin Williams (John Keating, Dead Poets Society)

Quote: Wake up determined, go to bed satisfied.
Author: Dwayne The Rock Johnson

Quote: We are not our best intentions. We are what we do.
Author: Amy Dickinson

Quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
Author: C.S.Lewis

Quote: If my mind can conceive it, if my heart can believe it, then I can achieve it.
Author: Muhammad Ali

Quote: Nothing in the world can take the place of Persistence. Talent will not; nothing is more common than unsuccessful men with talent. Genius will not; unrewarded genius is almost a proverb. Education will not; the world is full of educated derelicts. The slogan 'Press On' has solved and always will solve the problems of the human race.
Author: Calvin Coolidge

Quote: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot; but make it hot by striking.
Author: William Butler Yeats

Quote: If you're not making mistakes, then you're not making decisions
Author: Catherine Cook

Quote: I'm a dreamer. I have to dream and reach for the stars, and if I miss a star then I grab a handful of clouds.
Author: Mike Tyson

Quote: I have no special talents. I am only passionately curious.
Author: Albert Einstein

Quote: Nothing in life is to be feared, it is only to be understood. Now is the time to understand more, so that we may fear less.
Author: Marie Curie, pioneering physicist and chemist

Quote: If you're going through hell, keep going.
Author: Winston Churchill, British Prime Minister

Quote: An ant on the move does more than a dozing ox.
Author: Lao-Tzu, Philosopher
